document_data.name: Day of Drawing Down
document_data.mainbody: The '''Day of Drawing Down''' was a solemn ceremony practiced annually by members of the [[Church of Geb]] on the [[Nightal 30|last day of Nightal]].
document_data.Description: This ceremony was meant to mark the deaths of all those who died within mountains or underground over the past months of that year.
document_data.Activities: Each year to mark the ocassion, at least one abandoned mine was collapsed.
